sys:positions.title: President of Sunsari District's Nepali Congress party

description: Hari Nath Bastola (born 1942) is a Nepali politician and a long-serving member of the Nepali Congress party. A pro-democracy activist, he was imprisoned several times before his election to the Pratinidhi Sabha in 1994, representing the Sunsari-4 constituency. He served as the President of the Sunsari District's Nepali Congress for over 25 years. In parliament, he advocated for equal representation for minority ethnicities and infrastructure development. After his term ended in 1999, he continued organizing for his party and is now involved in social work and fundraising for community projects.
short_description: Nepalese politician and pro-democracy activist belonging to the Nepali Congress, who served as a Member of Parliament from 1994 to 1999.
